jcr:content.jcr:title: Buying guide : Find a partner
jcr:content.browserTitle: Buying guide: Find a partner | Adobe InDesign Server
jcr:content.metaDescription: With a large number of partners to choose from, the Adobe InDesign Server partner finder gives you access to a selection of companies that can help you build your InDesign Server solution.

text_84f3.text:
Build a solution    |    Find a partner    |    Licensing

 

With a large number of partners to choose from, the Adobe® InDesign® Server partner finder gives you access to a selection of companies that can help you build your InDesign Server solution. Click the arrow on the section below that represents the region in which you are located. Once you choose the region, you will be presented with a list of InDesign Server partners, along with details of the types of solutions they provide. For more information about any of the partners listed, including a link to their websites, click the partner name.

text_9c69a5fb-6606-4785-a72c-34580ca1702.text:
Type of solutions

 
LiveCycle Forms Standard and Forms Pro ES4
LiveCycle Forms Standard and Forms Pro ES4

text_8c3a.text:
VDP
Personalized marketing, also known as Variable Data Publishing (VDP) or 1:1 marketing.
 
Web to print
Brochure, flyer, and catalog creation and more using a browser
 
Self-service ads
Self-service and automated ad creation

text_29c2.text:
Editorial workflow automation
Editorial workflow automation, including newspaper and magazine editorial solutions
 
Training
Developer training and consultancy services for InDesign Server

text_3f1.text: For more information about each of these categories, see common solutions powered by InDesign Server.

text_e57b.text: To the top

text_1_6af9f373-1945-43a8-9bdc-46037511e.text:
InDesign Server is available for purhcase through most authorized Adobe resellers however they are not able to provide any assistance or training on the product. Please see License Guide for pricing and SKU information before contacting a reseller. 
 
These distributors can sell InDesign Server to end customers who are only interested in purchasing a license rather than an integrated solution. They can provide pre-sales support, consulting, and development resources.
 
Silicon Publishing
J2S
Datalogics
PDI Consultores
Priint/Werk II
Samuraiz (Japan only)
